text: Nikita Gubenko (born 1994) is a Russian slalom canoeist who has competed at the international level since 2011. He won a silver medal in the Extreme K1 event at the 2019 Extreme Canoe Slalom World Championships in Prague. ==World Cup individual podiums== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font- size:95%;" !Season !Date !Venue !Position !Event |- | 2018 || align=right| 1 Jul 2018 ||align=left| Kraków || bgcolor=gold|1st || Extreme K1 |- | 2019 || align=right| 8 September 2019 ||align=left| Prague || bgcolor=silver|2nd || Extreme K11 |} : 1 World Championship counting for World Cup points ==References== Category:Living people Category:Russian male canoeists Category:1994 births Category:Medalists at the ICF Canoe Slalom World Championships
title: Nikita Gubenko
